DOC.brief_summary: This study assess platelet function safety healthy male volunteer follow dos intravenous diclofenac compare oral diclofenac ( Cataflam ) , intravenous ketorolac oral aspirin .
DOC.brief_title: Platelet Function Safety After IV Oral Diclofenac , IV Ketorolac Oral Aspirin Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective evaluate platelet function follow intravenous diclofenac , oral diclofenac ( Cataflam ) , intravenous ketorolac oral aspirin .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject . Willing able stay clinical site approximately 8 night 9 day return clinic approximately 7 day discharge . Bleeding abnormalities cardiovascular event . Known allergy hypersensitivity active compound excipients use study .
